Question: China Sodium-ion Times (Shenzhen) CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
China Sodium-ion Times (Shenzhen) CES 2024

- Jiana Energy is a Chinese sodium-ion battery materials startup focusing on core materials for sodium-ion batteries.
- The company aims to achieve mass production in the first half of 2024, with plans to build a battery cathode and anode material production line with an annual output of 10,000 tons by the end of the year.
- Sodium-ion batteries are being developed as an alternative to lithium batteries, offering potential solutions to lithium shortage and price increases in the new energy industry.
- The company is aiming to integrate upstream and downstream resources in the industrial chain to promote the application of sodium-ion batteries in various scenarios.
- The company has received investments from venture capital firms and has completed an angel round of financing.
- The industrialization of sodium-ion batteries in China is expected to see significant progress, with several companies planning to establish mass production lines for sodium-ion batteries.
